summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 1370, entitled "An Ordinance granting to the Portland & Puget Sound Railroad Company, its successors or assigns, the right or authority to locate, construct, lay down, operate and maintain a standard gauge railroad, consisting of one or more tracks, upon and along a tract or tracts of land hereinafter described, and to operate said Railroad upon the conditions prescribed in this Ordinance", approved June 9, 1890, and Ordinance No. 1476, approved August 16, 1890.
